title: Devil Girl from Mars (restored, colorized) (1954, sci-fi, imdb score: 4.9)

sources.title: Devil Girl From Mars 1953 Colorized Movie 720p
sources.description: Devil Girl from Mars is a 1954 British second feature black-and-white science fiction film , produced by the Danziger Brothers , directed by David MacDonald and starring Patricia Laffan , Hugh McDermott , Hazel Court , Peter Reynolds , and Adrienne Corri . It was released by British Lion , and released in the United States the following year. A female alien is sent from Mars to acquire human males to replace their declining male population. When negotiation, then intimidation, fails she must use force to obtain co-operation from a remote Scottish village where she has landed her crippled flying saucer.
